title: How should one can remember the thing which he had read and what is the best way of reading to remember for longer time? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would suggest you to study Edgar Dale's Cone of Experience. “According to the principle, the more senses that are involved in learning, the more and better the learning will be.”  These are some takeaway points from Edgar Dale's Cone of Experience: 1. The most effective way to remember anything is by doing it. When you’re learning in real life situation, you tend to learn, understand and remember things better. 2. The second most effective way is discussion, teaching or demonstration of the topic you want to remember.
